bill_title: create a requirement for the distribution of certain voter information.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to create a requirement for the distribution of certain voter information. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 12-4-41.1. Voter information--Distribution--Absentee ballots. The secretary of state and any county auditor shall provide two options for the distribution of voter information regarding absentee ballots, as allowed by § 12-4-41: (1) An option to receive a list of voters who have requested an absentee ballot; or (2) An option to receive a list of voters who have requested, received, or returned an absentee ballot.

action_log.status_text: Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
